## ğŸŒ Contributing Translations

We welcome contributions to add more languages! Please follow the existing structure:

```
guide/
â”œâ”€â”€ en/              # English
â”œâ”€â”€ zh-hans/         # Simplified Chinese
â””â”€â”€ [language-code]/ # Your language
```

## ğŸ“ Documentation Structure

Each language directory contains:

- **QUICKSTART.md** - Quick start guide for beginners
- **INSTALLATION.md** - Detailed installation instructions for various scenarios
- **USAGE.md** - Comprehensive usage guide with examples
- **PUBLISHING.md** - Guide for maintainers on publishing to PyPI
